alert.note: Alert for Antelope Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 27 at 2:35AM PST until December 27 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph, except 25 to 40 mph with gusts to 55 mph in the foothills. * WHERE...Antelope Valley. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds and reduced visibility from blowing dust will make driving difficult. Major roadways that will likely be impacted by the strong winds include Highways 14 and 138. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
